metadata.title: CVE-2020-19861 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When a zone file in ldns 1.7.1 is parsed, the function ldns_nsec3_salt_datais too trusted for the length value obtained from the zone file. When thememcpy is copied, the 0xfe - ldns_rdf_size(salt_rdf) byte data can becopied, causing heap overflow information leakage.

criterions.comment: ldns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
